name: Fennel
description:
Once upon a time, or even just now.

Lives an odd bunch of people who are really quite small.

So tiny in fact they made their homes with leaves, 

and you can only find them on trees that are tall.
They are happy, peaceful and just want to be your friend.
You can find them in the branches, that is where they will be.
However one night the wind was strong and just like many before her.
A little girl named Fennel fell down to the bottom of the tree.
Eventually she woke up, laying flat on the ground.
However looking around she realised she was all alone.
“Oh no” she said with a surprise “ it is too dangerous down here.”
“I need to get up!” and so she started to make her way home...
